ComicInfo.Summary:
With road quickly running out between the Sons and the Ghost Brothers, Kendra discovers a dark secret in the club's past that could mean a grisly end for her and Tig. With all options potentially ending bloody, Jax and the crew faces a decision that will most certainly end in death leaving only one question: whose?

Studios Exclusive Bobby "Mugshot" Variant" | Unlisted | 4 |
